// pages
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

ll x[] = {0, 9, 189, 2889, 38889, 488889, 5888889, 68888889, 788888889, 8888888889LL};
ll y[] = {0, 9, 99, 999, 9999, 99999, 999999, 9999999, 99999999, 999999999};

int main()
{
	char ch[14];
	while(scanf("%s",&ch) > 0)
	{
		if(ch[0] == '#')break;
		int n = atoi(ch);
		int i = -1;
		while(x[++i] <= n);
		if((n - x[i - 1]) % i == 0)
			printf("%lld\n", y[i - 1] + ((n - x[i - 1]) / i));
		else
			printf("Impossible!\n");
	}	
	return 0;
}
